meanings.definition: A printmaking technique in which only one impression is made from a printing plate
meanings.sent1: She created beautiful monoprints in her art class.
meanings.sent2: The gallery displayed a collection of unique monoprints.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled ink on the monoprints, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her monoprints were like fleeting moments captured on paper.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's demonstration on monoprints left a lasting impression on the students.
